_xResult.title: We Meet at Destiny Dress
_xResult.shortdesc: Custom made velvet gown with fine tulle skirt
_xResult.longdesc:
Be drop-dead gorgeous and red-carpet ready in this made to measure evening gown. A spectacularly elegant dress from ZaZa's original couture series, this special design of geometric striped lines makes it a perfect evening dress for weddings, formal events or festive parties. With a generous neckline and a perfect blend of velvet, tulle and sequins, this custom made piece is your go-to couture dress for exceptional events.


You need an evening gown made custom to your measurements. You'll love the feeling of knowing it's made just for you and fits you perfectly!

properties.propvalue: Velvet bodice with a tulle skirt
